costs.name: Exotic Cipher
costs.description: Present this to Xûr or the Monument to Lost Lights to receive a reward. You can only hold one of this item at a time.

costs.description: Required for forging Masterwork gear. Obtained from challenging activities or purchasable from the Cryptarch in the Tower.
